name: tp2intervals
description: Sync Third Party apps to Intervals.icu

scripts.electron:start: concurrently "npm run electron:build" "npm run start --prefix ../ui" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && electron-forge start"
scripts.electron:package: npm run electron:build && npm run build --prefix ../ui && electron-forge package
scripts.electron:make: npm run electron:build && npm run build --prefix ../ui && electron-forge make
scripts.electron:publish-app: npm run electron:build && npm run build --prefix ../ui && electron-forge publish
